languages.text: "Мы будем сражаться. Я читаю в ваших душах алчный интерес к тому, что скрыто в этой крипте. И не позволю вам завладеть этой богохульной вещью!"
"We shall fight. I sense your souls' greedy interest in what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"
languages.original_text: "Мы будем сражаться. Я читаю в ваших душах алчный интерес к тому, что скрыто в этой крипте. И не позволю вам завладеть этой богохульной вещью!"

traits.locale_text: "We will fight. I read a greedy interest in your souls for what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "We will fight. I read a greedy interest in your souls for what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "We will fight. I'm sensing a greedy interest your souls nurse for what is hidden in this crypt. And I won't allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "We will fight. I'm sensing a greedy interest your souls nurse for what is hidden in this crypt. And I won't allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "We shall fight. I sense your souls' greedy interest in what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "We shall fight. I sense your souls' greedy interest in what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "We shall fight. I sense your souls' greedy interest in what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"

languages.text: « Nous nous battrons. Je sens que vos âmes nourrissent un intérêt cupide pour ce qui se cache dans cette crypte et je ne vous permettrai pas de mettre la main sur cette chose qui a tout d'un blasphème ! »
languages.original_text: "We shall fight. I sense your souls' greedy interest in what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"

traits.locale_text: « En nous battant. Je sens que vous nourrissez un intérêt cupide pour ce qui se cache dans cette crypte et je ne vous laisserai pas mettre la main sur cette chose qui a tout d'un blasphème ! »
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: «Vamos a luchar. Siento el avaricioso interés de vuestras almas por lo que esconde esta cripta. ¡Y no dejaré que os hagáis con semejante blasfemia!».
languages.original_text: "We shall fight. I sense your souls' greedy interest in what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"

traits.locale_text: «Vamos a luchar. Siento el avaricioso interés de vuestras almas por lo que esconde esta cripta. ¡Y no dejaré que os hagáis con semejante blasfemia!».
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: “打一仗吧。我能感觉到，你们的灵魂对这座墓穴中的东西怀着贪婪的兴趣，我绝不允许你们得到这件亵渎神明的造物！”
languages.original_text: "We shall fight. I sense your souls' greedy interest in what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"

traits.locale_text: “打一仗吧。我能感觉到，你们的灵魂对这座墓穴中的东西怀着贪婪的兴趣，我绝不允许你们得到这件亵渎神明的造物！”
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: 「戦おうではないか。この地下墓地に隠されたものに対して、お前たちの魂が貪欲を抱いているのを感じる。そして、この冒涜的なものを手に入れることは許されざることなのだ！」
languages.original_text: "We shall fight. I sense your souls' greedy interest in what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"

traits.locale_text: 「戦おうではないか。この地下墓地に隠されたものに対して、お前たちの魂が貪欲を抱いているのを感じる。そして、この冒涜的なものを手に入れることは許されざることなのだ！」
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: "Wir werden kämpfen. Ich spüre das gierige Interesse Eurer Seelen an dem, was in dieser Krypta verborgen ist. Und ich lasse nicht zu, dass ihr dieses blasphemische Ding in Euren Besitz bringt!"
languages.original_text: "We shall fight. I sense your souls' greedy interest in what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden kämpfen. Ich spüre, dass Eure Seelen ein gieriges Interesse an dem nähren, was in dieser Krypta verborgen ist. Und ich lasse nicht zu, dass ihr dieses blasphemische Ding in Euren Besitz bringt!"
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: "Savaşalım. Bu mahzende ne gizlendiğini açgözlülükle merak eden ruhunu hissediyorum. Bu günahkâr şeye sahip olmana izin vermeyeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "We shall fight. I sense your souls' greedy interest in what is hidden in this crypt. And I will not allow you to take possession of this blasphemous thing!"
